name: Rusty Mechanic
description:
The game might take some time to load in all the assets, sorry!

uses standard WASD and arrow keys layout for movement

Huge thanks to Moby for the assets! 

The background music - https://wowsound.com/product/cpsw-persistence/

Dead sound - https://freesound.org/people/Jofae/sounds/364929/

(the rest of the sounds i can't find anymore, but i believe was all completely free to use)

The code is bad, horrible in fact, i started this jam at the 12 hour mark and i had to go do something else in between but i got a playable game and that's all that matters. I used the rust programming language with the macroquad game library to put it all together, the source code is in a neat little zip file, but a github repository should be out soon .

Heads up, I've only tested this on linux and the web! but I've had windows work with macroquad flawlessly that should be fine.
